title: How to make skarner somewhat fun to play .
body: Give him the outside buff of getting out of a crystal zone for a amount of time like a harvesting buff and im sure he would be much less clunky and feel fresh .

replies.body: I feel like they should just pull back one of his previous passives, the spires push him away from top lane and that's where I played him for a solid amount of time
he needs traps like zoe to grab people to him  and needs small scorpions  to follow him like yorick
sound really cool because his lore say hes a really smart creature and that it a really nice idea right there .

I like the idea of his buff lasting a bit even when he's outside of his Crystal area. The only issue is that because the crystal Buffs are more or less invisible power, essentially just stat Buffs, it would be very frustrating to have to try to play around that sort of ability as once he has it there's nothing you can do to get it off of him aside from just not being around until it wears off. Some people think that the natural counter is to destroy them whenever they pop up, but the only person who can reliably do that is the jungler, as the crystals are located deep in the jungle and that would be extremely dangerous and borderline suicidal to consistently try to shut down as a laner.

Do you mean if his buff lasted for some amount of time after he left the crystal zone?

or do you mean something else? If you do then please clarify, I do not understand.
